commit message: Dark theme for toolbar popup too

Merge pull request #36 from SpiritCroc/master

Dark theme for toolbar popup too

Restart MainActivity without PendingIntent to apply theme

The approach with the PendingIntent can cause weird behaviour, e.g. opening of the app after the user closed it.
Restarting MainActivity onResume if the theme changed works better for me.

Prefer valid old data over invalid new data

Invalid downloads can appear e.g. when losing connection while downloading new information; previously, this led to no weather information at all after app restart

Handle incorrect city name

Handle scenario when user specifies incorrect city name.
Application remembers previously specified city before sending a new request to
server. If request fails (code 404 has been received), application will:
* show error message 'Specified city is not found.'
* restore previosly specified city
